publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-8199 Jamie Hepburn: Congratulations for CashBack for Communities Confidence in Cumbernauld Colts—That the Parliament warmly welcomes the announcement from the Scottish Government that that Cumbernauld Colts Football Club has been awarded £400,000 from the CashBack for Communities programme; notes that this funding will help to fund a new full-size 3G pitch and changing and recreational facilities and believes that this will have considerable benefits for the club and the wider community; congratulates the club chairman, Stewart McKenzie, and everyone involved in the club on putting together such a successful bid, and looks forward to Cumbernauld Colts FC going from strength to strength in the future.
